titles.title: A resolution providing for the further consideration of the bill (H.R. 1451) to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1988, 1989, 1990, and 1991, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-109.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 293 - 95 (Record Vote No: 151).

bill.summary: 5/27/1987--Introduced. Waives points of order, during the further consideration of H.R. 1451 (old age assistance), against the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Education and Labor.
